knimeNode.name: Similar fragments
knimeNode.shortDescription: Find similar fragments to queries based on distance matrix.

fullDescription.intro: Find similar fragments to queries based on distance matrix.
fullDescription.option: The column containing the fragment identifiers

Location of distance matrix, can be the base url of kripodb webservice or local file. Webservice can be started with `kripodb serve /data/kripo/tiny/distances.h5`. Or use the public Kripo webservice at 'http://3d-e-chem.vu-compmedchem.nl/kripodb'. When combining the public webservice with the fragment kripo sqlite database make sure to use the full PDB version of the database.
Cutoff, scores below cutoff are discarded.
Maximum number of hits for each query.

ports.outPort: Table with similar Kripo fragment identifiers and scores vs the input table.
